alert.note: Alert for Baca County Including Springfield and Eastern Comanche Grasslands; Bent County Including Las Animas; Crowley County Including Ordway; Kiowa County Including Eads; Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest; Otero County Including La Junta and Western Comanche Grasslands; Prowers County Including Lamar; Pueblo County Including Pueblo; Southern El Paso County Including Fort Carson and Colorado Springs; Teller County, Rampart Range Including Pikes Peak and Florissant Fossil Beds National Monument (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued April 20 at 8:25PM MDT until April 22 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning is in effect for Thursday from noon to 9PM for gusty winds and low humidity values for fire weather zones 222, 224, 225, 229, 230, and 233 which includes the San Luis Valley, the Wet Mountain Valley, and Fremont, Huerfano, and Las Animas Counties... ...Fire Weather Watch is in effect for Friday morning through evening for gusty winds and low relative humidity, which includes the San Luis Valley, the Wet Mountain Valley, Fremont and Teller Counties and the rest of the eastern plains... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 221...226...227...228...231...232...234... 235...236 AND 237... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 221...226...227...228... 231...232...234...235...236 and 237. * Winds...South 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * Timing...11 AM to 8 PM. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Temperatures...80s to mid 90s * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread. Widespread blowing dust will reduce visibilities to near zero throughout the day.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.
